qas.question: How many wires did Bell send a signal through?
For  his system to work, Bell had to change what about each code?
Bell needed to fix both the transmitter and what?

context: Returning home to <a3_0>Brantford<a3_0/> after six months abroad, Bell continued his experiments with his "harmonic telegraph".[N <a0_0>1<a0_0/>2] The basic concept behind his device was that messages could be sent through a single wire if each message was transmitted at a different <a1_0>pitch<a1_0/>, but work on both the transmitter and <a2_0>receiver<a2_0/> was needed.
